vote.motion-ch: 動議中止議程文件FCR(2015-16)48的討論
vote.motion-en: Motion that discussion on FCR(2015-16)48 be now adjourned
Motion that further proceedings of the Committee be now adjourned

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案(編號：41)
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure (No. 41)

vote.motion-ch: 動議其後就相同議程項目下任何議案或待議議題進行點名表決時，委員會須在點名表決鐘聲響起一分鐘後進行點名表決
vote.motion-en: Motion that in the event of further divisions being claimed of any motions or questions under the same agenda item, the Committee do proceed such divisions immediately after the division bell has been rung for one minute

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案 (編號：42)
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure (No. 42)

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2015-16)48 工務小組委員會在2016年2月17日所提出的建議
vote.motion-en: FCR(2015-16)48 RECOMMENDATION OF THE PUBLIC WORKS SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 17 FEBRUARY 2016

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2015-16)40 追加撥款3億8,070 萬元，以支付長者醫療券計劃在2015-16年度的預算開支
vote.motion-en: FCR(2015-16)40 Supplementary provision of $380.7 million to meet the estimated expenditure for the Elderly Health Care Voucher Scheme in 2015-16.
